attributes.action: Force manufacturers and retailers to refund all customer who purchased HD-DVD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All manufacturers and retailers of HD-DVD players, records and discs should refund their customers after as the customer should not have to suffer commercial 'format wars' played out by manufacturers. Now that HD-DVD format has been officially dropped they should refund customers who have wasted money on expensive equipment which is now useless as software, blank or pre-recorded media for the platform will soon become unavailable.
